AI Description: TensorBoard is a suite of web applications for inspecting and understanding the TensorFlow runs and graphs. It enables visualization of TensorFlow graphs, as well as monitoring of training progress and evaluation metrics.
Core Features:
1. Visualization of TensorFlow graphs
2. Monitoring of training progress
3. Tracking and visualizing evaluation metrics
4. Debugging and profiling TensorFlow models
5. Integration with TensorFlow for deep learning tasks
General Tags: Tensorflow, Deep Learning, Visualization, Model Monitoring
